page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content:
{VILLAGE SOCIETIES AND ORGANIZATIONS
The{Arnside Broadsheet,}a monthly information leaflet compiled in the village and delivered free to every home, lists more than 25 local organizations ranging from a "Mother and Toddler Group" through sports clubs (like Badminton Club) and interst groups (like The Natural History Society) to the "Tuesday Club" for the "over 60's". The groups meet in rooms at the National School, in the W.I. Village Hall, in the Educational Institute, in rooms belonging to the churches or in club rooms throughout the village. There is no Cinema in the village but plays are presented by Arnside Players from time to time.
